com.io7m.r2.core

Interface R2SceneOpaquesType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    R2SceneOpaquesReadableType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2SceneOpaques

    public interface R2SceneOpaquesType
extends R2SceneOpaquesReadableType
    The set of opaque instances in a scene.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <M> void opaquesAddBatchedInstance(R2InstanceBatchedType i, R2MaterialOpaqueBatchedType<M> m)

      Add a billboarded instance to the scene using the given material.

      Add a single instance to the scene using the given material, in group 1.

      Add a single instance to the scene using the given material.
      void opaquesReset()
      Remove all instances from the scene.

        <M> void opaquesAddSingleInstanceInGroup(R2InstanceSingleType i,
                                         R2MaterialOpaqueSingleType<M> m,
                                         int group)
        Add a single instance to the scene using the given material. The instance is placed into the specified group, which must be a value in the range [1, {@link R2Stencils#MAXIMUM_GROUPS}].
        Type Parameters:
        M - The type of shader parameters
        Parameters:
        i - The instance
        m - The material
